column4: can someone please tell me how to use this?  http://manpages.ubuntu.com/manpages/lucid/man1/get-edid.1.html
i downloaded it and ungzipped it.  how do i use it?
it doesn't matter, use the deb
open the package manager, and install the package "read-edid" you can then use that command
can't you just install the package and run the command you want
i can install it through the package manager, but i dont see why you cant explain what i found; im not an idiot.
it's a man page, and if you read the info, you'd know it was a man page
the fact that I told you how to find out what it was and you wouldn't do it, so I had to download it for you and see what it was suggests to the contrary
if you had to download it, it suggests the contrary to you as well...
not at all, you'd be surprised how many people don't download the file correctly
how does someone download that file incorrectly?
synaptic is the package manager and I told you the exact package name earlier
try them out, it's personal taste
